metadata.title: MSK BS Mandala Colorful Flora Bohemian Style Bathroom Shower Curtain Waterproof Washable Curtain Set for Bath Room Decor with Hook 72 x 72 inches Red Green
features: This Mandala Bohemian Style Bathroom Shower Curtain is waterproof. It is adopted the digital printing technology, America countryside theme, retro barn wood. make your bathroom bright. Unique. Fun.

The shower curtain can not only used as shower curtain, but also used as blackout cloth, window curtain, tapestry tablecloth partition background- use at home, apartment, college dorm room, school shower, athletic club, gym ,bedroom, outdoor courtyard, farmhouse and everywhere else.

Our shower curtain is made from expertly chosen and thoroughly tested polyester fabric, Non PVC, Non plastic, Non peva, Eco-Friendly, Environmental friendly material, no odor, durable, healthy to your family.
The front and back of the fabric are treated with waterproofing, let water bead stay on the surface, quick to repel and dry. Or after use, machine washable.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
description: Waterproof polyester fabric, Includes 12 Plastic Hooks, single-sided printing
1. Rugged waterproof polyester fabric prevents water from splashing out of the shower room, super waterproof and ball waterproof.
2. The metal buttonhole design allows the shower curtain hook to be pulled at will to extend the life of the shower curtain.
3. Single-sided printing with thermal dye sublimation technology to prevent fading and lasting effects.
4. Easy to clean, chiller / hand wash. Air dry, do not bleach or dry.
2 Machine wash , hand wash or wipe clean with a damp cloth.
3 Due to differences in computer monitors display, there can be slight color variations between the actual product and your screen.
4 If you have any issue upon receiving the item, please contact us immediately. We will respond as soon as possible and ensure that your issue is properly handled.
